snippet: The Japanese deputy foreign minister is said to have strongly protested the 13-hour incursion by four Chinese surveillance ships near uninhabited islands also claimed by China and Taiwan.
abstract: Tensions escalate between Japan and China after Chinese ships enter Japanese-controlled waters in East China Sea for 13 hours.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese deputy foreign minister is said to have strongly protested the 13-hour incursion by four Chinese surveillance ships near uninhabited islands also claimed by China and Taiwan.

headline.seo: Japan Summons China’s Envoy Over Disputed Islands
headline.main: Japan Summons China’s Envoy in Latest Escalation of Tension Over Disputed Islands
headline.print_headline: Japan and China Escalate Tensions Over Island Group
